title: 🟥BEDSTUY🟩 X LARGE SUNNY CORNER 4BR/2BATH/Laundry @G/J/M/Z TRAIN
posting_body: ['*****THIS WONT LAST ON THE MARKET******', "State of the Art Gorgeous and modern updated SUNNY 4 bedroom DUPLEX apartment With 2 Bathroom's Corner building with Amazing light and Great views!,", 'This Building is located in the heart of BedStuy on the corner of Lafayette and Tompkins Ave right across of the Beautiful Famous Herbert Von King Park!', 'Large living room, Amazing layout! !!', 'Apartments show way bigger in person than square pictures allow.', 'For a Quick Response Please Text me 347 263 3994 for more details/info/showings', 'Great location!, easy walk to Clinton Hill and Fort Greene area, G train Bedford Nostrand Stop and J M train at Kosciuszko Stop near by.', 'Supermarket, Coffee shops and night life within one block walk!', 'Amazing layout, this corner building is designed with windows all around the apartment for maximum sunlight,', 'Large Sunny Living Room', "4 Nice Large Bedroom's With Huge Closet each room can fit Queen size Bed + Extra space", "2 Nice Modern Bathroom's", 'Central Air / Heat', 'High ceilings', 'Spot Lights', 'Hardwood floor!', 'Brand New stainless steel appliance', 'Laundry', 'Furnished Rooftop with breathtaking view to the park,', 'VERY NICE LAY OUT', 'SPACIOUS BEDROOMS WITH PERFECT NATURAL LIGHTING', 'CLOSET SPACE IN EACH BEDROOM', 'Walking distance to lots of bars, restaurants, shopping', 'Ready to move, good credit and income', '!!', 'GUARANTORS WELCOME']
